comment.author: 67127882@N07
comment._content: The reception at Government House, Dar es Salaam,  on the occasion of the Constitutional Conference in March 1961. To the left of centre is the British Secretary of State for the Colonies, the Rt.Hon.Iain Macleod, MP.  On the left is Mrs Macleod. Behind her is the Governor's Private Secretary, Mr I H Norton.
